segments.text: We've managed to reduce our energy consumption in our factory by about 15 per cent in the last two years .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's excellent . How have you managed that ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Mainly because we've invested in a heat recovery system .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , we use the exhaust gases from our printing presses to provide energy to heat our dryers .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What other sources of energy do you use ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We don't use any fossil fuels . Most of our power comes from hydro-electric plants . We're hoping to use even more energy from alternative sources in the future - perhaps even wind power .
segments.speaker: S1
